name: Connect Four AI
description: An AI and GUI for the classic Connect Four game

name: Fallen Flame
description: A survival-adventure game that I helped design and develop

name: Critterworld
description: An evolution simulator implemented as a networked Java service with a GUI. Created a parser and interpreter for a custom language that dictates species rules and a fault injector to simulate mutations and evolution.

name: Color Memory Game
description: A colorful memory game built on the FDRM-K64F board with a user interface embedded through LED signals

name: Turtle Fractals
description: Generates fractals of customizable depth, color, angles, etc.

name: Space Invaders
description: Re-creation of the classic Space Invaders game

name: Brella
description: Sends users a text if it is going to rain tomorrow
